Why Independent?
Every indie coffee shop is a creative act. The playlist, the menu, the corner table—someone chose every detail. When you walk in, you're not just buying coffee. You're showing up for their point of view.

Chains give you consistency. Independents give you character. Joe helps you find, support, and stay connected to the shops that make your city worth living in.

How It Works

Discover. Order. Earn.

01

Discover

Search 57,000+ independent coffee shops. Find the hidden gems locals love—in your neighborhood or anywhere you travel.

02

Order Ahead

At 665+ joe partners, order from your phone. Walk in, grab your drink, and get on with your day.

03

Build Your Routine

Earn rewards at every shop in the network. Your loyalty travels with you—one app, thousands of independents.
